name: Valtteri Bottas
introduction: Valtteri Bottas (born 28 August, 1989 in Nastola, Finland) is a Formula One driver for the Mercedes team. Having tested with the Williams team since 2010, Bottas was promoted to a race seat for 2013. For the 2015 season, Bottas retained his race seat at Williams, partnered by Felipe Massa. In 2017, he moved to Mercedes to replace retired and reigning world champion Nico Rosberg and partner Lewis Hamilton.[1] His first podium came in the 2014 Austrian Grand Prix. He went on to finish 4th in the Drivers' Championship in 2014. He got his first pole at the 2017 Bahrain Grand Prix, and his first win at the Russian Grand Prix in the same year. He took his first double at the 2017 Austrian Grand Prix.
